articles.title: Lewis Hamilton says he won't remove piercings even after his exemption expires - PlanetF1
articles.description: Even after his piercings exemption expires, Lewis Hamilton is in no mood to fully comply with the FIA's rules.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton is remaining defiant about his piercings despite the recent furore over the FIAs clampdown on drivers jewellery.

articles.title: Carlos Tevez will contribute to Mark Noble's West Ham farewell party at the London Stadium on Sunday - Daily Mail
articles.description: Hammers officials are putting the finishing touches to plans for their tributes to commemorate their outgoing captain, including a host of celebrations at the London Stadium this Sunday.
articles.content:
Carlos Tevez will lead a star-studded cast in wishing Mark Noble a happy retirement as the West Ham captain prepares to hang up his boots.
